Package pw.ollie.politics

Class Politics

  • java.lang.Object
    • pw.ollie.politics.Politics
  • public final class Politics
extends Object
    Static access methods for Politics' managers and other objects. Note that some methods may return null if the relevant aspect of Politics is configured to be disabled.

    Most methods may also throw NullPointerException if called while Politics is disabled.

        public static PoliticsFileSystem getFileSystem()

        Returns:

      • getPoliticsEconomy

        public static PoliticsEconomy getPoliticsEconomy()
        Gets the PoliticsEconomy associated with the current plugin instance.

        Will return null if the plugin is not configured to enable economy features.

        Returns:
        current plugin PoliticsEconomy instance, or null if economy features are disabled

      • getTaxationManager

        public static TaxationManager getTaxationManager()
        Gets the TaxationManager associated with the current plugin instance.

        Will return null if the plugin is not configured to enable taxation features.

        Returns:
        current plugin TaxationManager instance, or null if taxation features are disabled

      • getGroupById

        public static Group getGroupById​(int id)
        Gets the Group with the given unique id.

        Will return null if there is no Group with that id.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the relevant Group for the given id
